Package index

All functions

accuracy()
Get accuracy report from simdata
alpha_cov_to_var()
Create matrix var(alpha) from covariances on prior
alpha_in_group()
Generate binary matrix to indicate where are the loadings related to groups.
car()
CAR operation
car_conditional()
prior engine: CAR conditional for alpha covariance in models with more than one group
car_expl()
prior engine: CAR for alpha exploratory model
car_simple()
prior engine: CAR with simple neighborhood matrix
diagnostic()
Get diagnostic statistics from rstan::stanfit
distances()
Get distances (in km) between points
elapsed_time_table()
Get table with elapsed time of stan::stanfit in hours
export()
Export information and most common plots of a project
extract_cmd()
Create sample from CmdStan
generate_data()
Generate simulated data
generate_space()
Generate random points
get_chains_mcmc()
Transform rstan::stanfit into coda::mcmc.list
get_nearest_row()
Use LSAP algorithm to select nearest points
group_limits()
Create list with row limit of each group
header_col()
Shiny column with HTML header
init()
Generate constant initial values for STAN MCMC
interface()
Adjust the data argument on rstan::stan
interface_normal()
To be used with fastan::interface
invert_signal()
Inver signal in factor
loglik()
Calculate log-likelihood
missing_validation()
Missing validation
missing_validation_selection()
Missing validation algorithm
n.fac()
Get number of factors of a model
neib_dist()
Calculate neighborhood matrix from maximum distance between points
neib_simple()
Generate simple neighborhood matrix for line spaces.
neib_voronoi()
Calculate neighborhood matrix from Voronoi tessellation
new_project()
Generate new fastan::project
param.dim()
Get dimension of parameters
plot_bias()
Plot bias of simdata
plot_contrast()
Plot contrast matrix
plot_diagnostic()
Plot diagnostic stats
plot_hpd()
Plot HPD interval & other stats
plot_lambda()
Plot lambdas
plot_map()
Plot basic map structure
plot_map_data()
Plot map data
plot_map_post()
Plot map posterior statistics
plot_map_post_factor()
Plot map posterior association
plot_missing()
Plot missing values pattern
plot_mock_doc()
Mock function for the sole purpose of documentation
plot_normal_prior()
Plot prior hyperparameters
plot_posterior()
Plot posterior sample histogram and/or density
plot_trace()
Plot Posterior sample trace plot
prior_normal()
Generate prior with independence between parameters
process_data()
Process data in fastan::data format
prop.missing()
Calculate proportion of missing values in data
real_from_dist()
Generate real value list from distributions
real_from_posterior()
Generate real value list from posterior
real_from_prior()
Generate real value list from prior
remove()
Remove attributes from fastan::project

tidy: set data in project

space_process()

Run STAN MCMC

Transform summary from list of 3D matrices to list of tibbles
summary_matrix()
Get summary from rstan::stanfit object
try_set()
Try set attribute in project and catch errors
validate_proj_arg()
Validates argument in functions that accepct either the whole fastan::project or one of its attributes
